document.full_text: the lakers have a number of players signed through at least the 2012-13 season. but coach phil jackson is retiring, and a swift second-round exit could initiate further changes.
document.title: lakers face early exit, and the potential for many off-season departures
lines_and_colors: the lakers have a number of players signed through at least the 2012-13 season. but coach phil jackson is retiring, and a swift second-round exit could initiate further changes.
